name: 楊安石
objective: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1. 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。2. 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。3. 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
schedule:
週次  單元主題
1     Reviews; 7.1 Matrices, Vectors.
2     7.2 Matrix Multiplication; 7.3 Linear Systems of Equations;
Gauss Elimination.
3     7.4 Linear Independence; Rank of a Matrix; 7.5 Solutions of
Linear Systems.
4     7.6 Second- and Third-Order Determinants; 7.7 Determinants;
Cramer’s Ruler.
5     7.8 Inverse of a Matrix; Gauss-Jordan Elimination;
8.1 Eigenvalues; Eigenvectors.
6     8.2 Some Applications of Eigenvalue Problems; 8.3 Symmetric,
Skew-Symmetric Matrices.
7     9.1 Vectors in 2-Space and 3-Space; 9.2 Inner Product.
8     9.3 Vector Product; 9.4 Vector and Scalar Functions and
Fields; Derivatives.
9     期中考
10    9.5 Curves; Arc Length; 9.7 Gradient of a Scalar Field; Directional Derivative.
11    9.8 Divergence of a Vector Field; 9.9 Curl of a Vector Field; 10.1 Line Integrals.
12    10.2 Path Independence of Line Integrals; 10.3 Double Integrals; 10.4 Green’s Theorem in the Plane.
13    10.5 Surfaces for Surface Integrals; 10.6 Surface Integrals.
14    11.1 Fourier Series; 11.2 Functions of Any Period p=2L
15    11.3 Even and Odd Functions; Half-Range Expansions; 11.7 Fourier Integral;
16    12.1 Basic Concepts; 12.3 Solution by Separating Variables
17    12.3 Solution by Separating Variables; Use of Fourier Series.
18    期末考
scorePolicy: 平時50%(內含小考40%,平時出缺席考核與課堂行為觀察10%，點名缺席一次扣1%，最多扣至10%), 期中考25%, 期末考25%
